snippet: The Carlyle Group appears to be struggling to sell its initial public offering to investors, who have reason to be gun-shy based on past experience with other private equity firms.
abstract: The Carlyle Group appears to be struggling to sell its initial public offering to investors, who have reason to be gun-shy based on past experience with other private equity firms.

headline.main: In Private Equity I.P.O., a Shareholder Fear of Losing Favor
headline.print_headline: In Private Equity I.P.O., a Shareholder Fear of Losing Favor
